snippet: Defenseman Marek Zidlicky came to the Devils in a February trade with the Minnesota Wild, making them more consistent and bolstering the power play.
abstract: New Jersey Devils defenseman Marek Zidlicky has made the team more consistent and bolstered their power play.
lead_paragraph: Defenseman Marek Zidlicky came to the Devils in a February trade with the Minnesota Wild, making them more consistent and bolstering the power play.

headline.seo: 2012 Stanley Cup - Marek Zidlicky Has Filled Gap for Devils Defense
headline.main: Devils Filled Defensive Gap With Zidlicky, and a Hole in His Résumé, Too
headline.print_headline: Devils Filled Defensive Gap With Zidlicky, and a Hole in His Résumé, Too
